LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipWildness: Set the wildness for this animal. (0 = 0%, 0.5 = 50%, 1 = 100%) Values of 100% or higher will make an animal untamable. Keep in mind that some animals are not supposed to be tameable, especially some modded animals will throw errors when tamed!
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMinWildness: Set the lowest possible wildness for all animals. Values of 100% or higher will make all animals untamable.
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMaxWildness: Set the highest possible wildness for all animals. Keep in mind that some animals are not supposed to be tameable, especially some modded animals will throw errors when tamed!
